attributes.action: Allow the Official Monster Raving Loony Party a place on BBC program, Question Time
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Great maturity has been shown by allowing extreme-right-winger Nick Griffin onto Question Time.

However, we notice there has never been a representative of the OMRLP on the show. We ask: Why not? They are a registered political party I do believe, let them have their say.

You did it for the BNP, now let it happen for the OMRLP.

rejection.details: This is a matter for the BBC
reasons: Outside the remit of the Prime Minister and Government
